00050 namespace DGtal
00051 {
00052   enum BoundEnum {BOUNDED = 0, UNBOUNDED = 1, BOUND_UNKNOWN = 2};
00053   enum SignEnum {SIGNED = 0, UNSIGNED = 1, SIGN_UNKNOWN = 2};

00055 
00057 // template class IntegerTraits
00067   template <typename T>
00068   struct IntegerTraits
00069   {
00070     // ----------------------- Associated types ------------------------------
00071     typedef TagUnknown IsBounded;
00072     typedef TagUnknown IsUnsigned;
00073     typedef TagFalse IsSpecialized;
00074     typedef T SignedVersion;
00075     typedef T UnsignedVersion;
00076     typedef T ReturnType;
00077 
00078     //Defines a type that represents the "best" way to pass
00079     // a parameter of type T to a function.
00080     typedef typename boost::call_traits<T>::param_type ParamType;
00081 
00082 
00087 #if ( defined(WIN32))
00088     static const T ZERO;
00089 #else
00090     static const T ZERO = T(0);
00091 #endif
00092 
00096 #if (defined (WIN32))
00097     static const T ONE;
00098 #else
00099     static const T ONE = T(1);
00100 #endif
00101 
00105     static ReturnType zero();
00106 
00110     static ReturnType one();
00111 
00116     static ReturnType min();
00117 
00122     static ReturnType max();
00123 
00128     static unsigned int digits();
00129 
00133     static BoundEnum isBounded();
00137     static SignEnum isUnsigned();
00138 
00139   }; // end of class IntegerTraits
00140

00148   template <>
00149   struct IntegerTraits<int>
00150   {
00151     typedef TagTrue IsBounded;
00152     typedef TagFalse IsUnsigned;
00153     typedef TagTrue IsSpecialized;
00154     typedef int SignedVersion;
00155     typedef unsigned int UnsignedVersion;
00156     typedef int ReturnType;
00157     typedef boost::call_traits<int>::param_type ParamType;
00158     static const int ZERO = 0;
00159     static const int ONE = 1;
00160     static ReturnType zero()
00161     {
00162       return 0;
00163     }
00164     static ReturnType one()
00165     {
00166       return 1;
00167     }
00168     static ReturnType min()
00169     {
00170       return boost::integer_traits<int>::const_min;
00171     }
00172     static ReturnType max()
00173     {
00174       return boost::integer_traits<int>::const_max;
00175     }
00176     static unsigned int digits()
00177     {
00178       return boost::integer_traits<int>::digits;
00179     }
00180     static BoundEnum isBounded()
00181     {
00182       return BOUNDED;
00183     }
00184     static SignEnum isUnsigned()
00185     {
00186       return UNSIGNED;
00187     }
00188   }; // end of class IntegerTraits<int>.
